remarks: Value of a translation in terms of an associated atom.  TODO:  FIX COMMENT TODO:  Is this useful elsewhere e.g. around ~ cdlemeg46fjv that use more complex proofs?  TODO:  Use ~ ltrnj to vastly simplify. (Contributed by NM, 23-Apr-2013.)
statement:
cdlemg2inv.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemg2inv.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemg2j.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemg2j.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdlemg2j.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlemg2j.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdlemg2j.u $e |- U = ( ( P .\/ Q ) ./\ W ) $.
cdlemg2fv2 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) /\ ( R e. A /\ -. R .<_ W ) ) /\ F e. T ) -> ( F ` ( R .\/ U ) ) = ( ( F ` R ) .\/ U ) ) $.
